rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: The entrance hall leads to a spacious living area. The design incorporates robust concrete elements and geometric forms in line with Brutalist style. Vastu guidelines have been integrated by placing the entrance in the auspicious north-west zone.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area is a dining room, designed for joint family gatherings. It features a high ceiling and large windows providing ample natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: The kitchen is located near the rear of the ground floor, with direct access to servant's quarters which serve as a functional space for household help. The layout respects Vastu principles by aligning service areas on the south side.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom & Bathrooms
rooms.description: A guest bedroom is provided along with an ensuite bathroom, incorporating robust materials and ample window openings to ensure balanced natural light as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed in a Brutalist style with reinforced concrete facades, ensuring security and alignment with Vastu principles.
Large window openings to promote natural light. The windows are strategically placed to balance the interior energies according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is spacious with a private ensuite bathroom, designed for privacy and comfort. The placement ensures positive energy flow as per Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom for family members, ensuring sufficient space and natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom to accommodate joint family needs, with ample built-in storage solutions.

openings.description: Balconies allow for private outdoor spaces. Their placement respects Vastu by avoiding direct alignment with service areas.
Windows are designed to maximize ventilation and light while ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: The rooftop terrace provides a communal outdoor space with a home office integrated into the design. This area offers panoramic views and is designed for joint family use.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space within the rooftop terrace, designed to offer an inspiring environment. It features soundproofing and natural light to enhance productivity.

openings.location: rooftop terrace and home office area
openings.description: Skylights ensure abundant natural lighting, in line with Vastu recommendations for a harmonious energy flow.
Staircases are designed to be wide and robust, incorporating Brutalist design elements. They facilitate smooth movement between floors while following local building norms.
